title: Specification of interface interaction objects
proctitle: CHI '94: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

authors.name: David A. Carr
authors.institution: University of Maryland, Computer Science Department, University of Maryland, Human Computer Interaction Laboratory, and RMS, Inc., NASA Goddard Space Flight Center, Code 520.9, Greenbelt, MD

references.text: Guttag, John and J. J. Horning, "Formal Specification as a Design Tool," Proceedings of the 7th Symposium on Programming Languages, 1980, pp. 251-261.
Hartson, H. Rex and Phillip D. Gray, "Temporal Aspects of Tasks in the User Action Notation", Human-Computer Interaction, Volume 7, 1992, Lawrence Erlbaum Associates, Inc. pp. 1-45.
HareI, David, "On Visual Formalisms," Communications ofthe ACM, 31(5), May 1988, pp. 514-530.
Hudson, Scott E., "Graphical Specification of Flexible User Interface Displays," Proceedings of the A CM SIGGRAPH Symposium on User Interface Software and Technology, 1989, pp. 105-114.
Jacob, Robert J. K., "A Specification Language for Direct-Manipulation User Interfaces," A CM Transactions on Graphics, vol. 5, no. 4, October 1986, pp. 283-317.

Plaisant, Catherine, and Wallace D., Touchscreen Toggle Switches: Push or Slide? Design Issues and Usability Study, University of Maryland, Center for Automation Research technical report CAR-TR-521 (also CS-TR-2557), Nov. 1990.
Plaisant, Catherine, and Wallace D., "Touchscreen Toggle Design", Proceedings of A CM CHI'92 Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems, 1992, pp. 667-668 and the CHI'92 Formal Video Program.
Rouff, Christopher, Specification and Rapid Prototyping of User Interfaces, University of Southern California Ph.D., 1991, 219 pages.
Shneiderman, Ben, "Multiparty Grammars and Related Features for Defining Interactive Systems," IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics, 12(2): 148-154, March/April 1982.
Shneiderman, Ben, Designing the User Interface, 2nd edition, Addison-Wesley, p. 517, 1992.
Siochi, Antonio C. and H. Rex Hartson, "Task Oriented Representation of Asynchronous User Interfaces", Proceedings of A CM CHI'89 Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems, 1989, pp. 183-188.
Vander Zanden, Bradley T., "Constraint Grammars -- A New Model for Specifying Graphical Applications," Proceedings of A CM CHI'89 Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems, 1989, pp. 325-330.
Wasserman, Anthony I., "Extending State Transition Diagrams for the Specification of Human-Computer Interaction", IEEE Transactions on Software Engineering, vol. SE-11(8), August 1985, pp. 699-713.

Wellner, Pierre D., "Statemaster: A UIMS Based on Statecharts for Prototyping and Target Implementation Notation for Specification," Proceedings of A CM CHI'89 Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems, 1989, pp. 177-182.
